On this page

Coding And Development Tools ​

Here are some of the best Coding And Development tools for freelancers:

GitHub

Host, review, and manage code with GitHub’s version control platform.

GitLab

Collaborate on code, CI/CD, and DevOps workflows with GitLab.

Bitbucket

Code, manage, and collaborate on Git repositories with Bitbucket.

Visual Studio Code

Free and powerful code editor with support for extensions and debugging.

Sublime Text

Lightweight and high-performance text editor for coding.

Atom

Hackable text editor for the 21st century, built on Electron.

CodePen

Front-end development playground for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

JSFiddle

Online IDE and code playground for front-end developers.

StackBlitz

Online IDE for building and deploying full-stack web apps.

Replit

Collaborative online coding platform for multiple programming languages.

Eclipse

Popular IDE for Java and other programming languages with extensive plugin support.

PyCharm

Professional IDE for Python development, with code analysis and debugging tools.
